channel.title: CVE Feed for Hikvision -- iDS-EXXHUH
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hikvision -- iDS-EXXHUH

item.title: CVE-2023-28811|2024-08-02T13:51:38.312Z -- hikvision -- ids-exxhuh
item.description: There is a buffer overflow in the password recovery feature of Hikvision NVR/DVR models. If exploited, an attacker on the same local area network (LAN) could cause the device to malfunction by sending specially crafted packets to an unpatched device.
